Ground State Solver (fd_greens.ground_state_solver)

class GroundStateSolver(hamiltonian: fd_greens.cirq_ver.molecular_hamiltonian.MolecularHamiltonian, qubits: Sequence[cirq.ops.raw_types.Qid], spin: str = 'd', fname: str = 'lih')[source]

Bases: object

Ground state solver.

Initializes a GroudStateSolver object.

Parameters

  • hamiltonian – The molecular Hamiltonian object.

  • qubits – The qubits on which the ground state is prepared.

  • fname – The HDF5 file name.

run() → None[source]

Runs the ground-state calculation with exact two-qubit gate decomposition.
